description:
Mario Platt joins us for the second instalment of the Startup Series! Learn about managing security as part of business risk, how to approach Security Consultant to work with you, implementing product level visibility and ensuring security elements are time-bound.

In this session, VP Head of Information Security, Mario Platt, shares his insights to ensuring the products you are building are safer, more secure and setup for success.

Listen and Learn | Q&A | Excellent Discussion

The series will be exploring the people, process and technology challenges that startups face and how to overcome them. Inject speed and security into your product delivery, consolidate and drive efficiency at the same time as scaling and learn industry tips, tricks and knowledge that can be applied for your startup success.

Join the conversation in the Bunker now: https://join.slack.com/t/devops-bunker/shared_invite/zt-cy0rb3xx-SzRIiCenuWzfW7kqyr81zQ
title: Startup Series with Mario Platt "Building Secure Products for Startups"
